author: thezim
body:
## PR Summary
This PR separates the macOS installation instructions from the Linux installation instructions. Follow up of #5218.

* Create new macOS.md for install instructions.
* Move macOS content from linux.md to macos.md.
* Update references in other documents.
* Update maOS version to 10.12+ for High Sierra support.
* Update manually removal instructions for macOS.
